程序包 org.springframework.boot.jta.atomikos

Support classes for Atomikos JTA.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AtomikosConnectionFactoryBean
    Spring friendly version of com.atomikos.jms.AtomikosConnectionFactoryBean.
    AtomikosDataSourceBean
    Spring friendly version of com.atomikos.jdbc.AtomikosDataSourceBean.
    AtomikosDependsOnBeanFactoryPostProcessor
    BeanFactoryPostProcessor to automatically setup the recommended dependsOn settings for correct Atomikos ordering.
    AtomikosProperties
    Bean friendly variant of Atomikos configuration properties.
    AtomikosProperties.Recovery
    Recovery specific settings.
    AtomikosXAConnectionFactoryWrapper
    XAConnectionFactoryWrapper that uses an AtomikosConnectionFactoryBean to wrap a XAConnectionFactory.
    AtomikosXADataSourceWrapper
    XADataSourceWrapper that uses an AtomikosDataSourceBean to wrap a XADataSource.

程序包org.springframework.boot.jta.atomikos的说明

Support classes for Atomikos JTA.
